org.opengis.cite.securityclient10.httpServer

Class ServerWms13

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.securityclient10.httpServer.EmulatedServer
      • org.opengis.cite.securityclient10.httpServer.ServerWms13

  • public class ServerWms13
extends EmulatedServer
    Class to emulate an OGC WMS 1.3.0 instance. Pass in the client request and servlet response to #handleRequest, and the method will auto fill the servlet response. Details of how this fake WMS 1.3.0 works are based on Web Map Service Implementation Specification (OGC 06-042).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.opengis.cite.securityclient10.httpServer.EmulatedServer

        documentBuilder, documentFactory, options, relayState

    • Constructor Summary

      Create an emulated WMS 1.3.0.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerWms13

        public ServerWms13(ServerOptions options)
        Create an emulated WMS 1.3.0. Currently hard-codes the output style for the XML string to have indented XML, and the XML declaration.
        Parameters:
        options - ServerOptions object with emulated server configuration

                   throws TransformerException
        Build a valid WMS 1.3.0 response for the client request, and automatically complete the response.
        Overrides:
        handleRequest in class EmulatedServer
        Parameters:
        request - Request from client
        response - Response to build to send back to client

        TransformerException - Exception if transformer could not convert document to stream

      • buildCapabilities

        public void buildCapabilities(org.opengis.cite.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              org.opengis.cite.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                              boolean completeCapabilities)
                       throws TransformerException
        Return an HTTP response to the client with valid headers and a body containing the Capabilities XML document. If `completeCapabilities` is true, then a complete capabilities document with a Content section (Layers) will be generated, and the embedded links will use the "/full" URL. If false, then a partial capabilities document will be generated without a Content section (Layers), and clients must use authentication to request the complete capabilities. Source: Annex E.1, Annex H.1
        Parameters:
        request - Source request from client, used to build absolute URLs for HREFs
        response - Response to build to send back to client
        completeCapabilities - If true, build a complete capabilities document
        Throws:
        TransformerException - Exception if transformer could not convert document to stream

      • buildException

        public void buildException(String reason,
                           org.opengis.cite.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                    throws TransformerException
        Return a Service Exception for `reason`. Response will have content type "application/vnd.ogc.se_xml" and HTTP status code 404. Source: Annex E.2, Annex H.2
        Parameters:
        reason - String with reason for Service Exception.
        response - Response to build to send back to client
        Throws:
        TransformerException - Exception if transformer could not convert document to stream
